config.description: The path to the configuration (.json) of the application.

override.description: If true, will override the source code of the HTML templated rather than generating alternate .static.html files.

updateTemplateUrls.description: If true (and if 'override' is false), update the component .ts files to use the .static.html templates

commentScssImport.description: If true, comment out the import of the UI Builder stylesheet in the project's stylesheet

appModuleDependencies.description: Path to a JSON file mapping a module's name to a list of component types (eg. {PokemonModule: ['pokemon-image', 'pokemon-name']})
